content.rendered:
New Launches

“The problems are solved, not by giving new information, but by arranging what we have known since long.”

- Ludwig Wittgenstein

The freshest designs, latest patterns and upholstery, and most diverse and culturally rooted furniture from Alankaram make their way to our ‘New Launches’. The spectrum of our latest launches range from swings to armchairs, and from daybeds to storage trunks. Find them all here.
